56462.en:
<voice 00200_00056462><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Wow! That's beautiful! So this is Hope
Hill.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56462.ja:
<voice 00200_00056462><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「うっわー！　キレーイ！
　ここが　希望の丘かあ。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56462.ko:
<voice 00200_00056462><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 우와~! 예쁘다~!
　여기가 희망의 언덕이구나.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56462.zh-Hans:
<voice 00200_00056462><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>哇！真漂亮！
这里就是希望之丘啊。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56462.zh-Hant:
<voice 00200_00056462><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>唔哇──！好漂亮──！
這就是希望之丘啊。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56463.en:
<voice 00400_00056463><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Thanks <pc>. You've helped me
get this far!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56463.ja:
<voice 00400_00056463><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「ありがとう　<pc>さん。
　あなたのおかげで　ここまで来れたよ！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56463.ko:
<voice 00400_00056463><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 고마워, <pc> 씨.
　당신 덕분에 여기까지 올 수 있었어!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56463.zh-Hans:
<voice 00400_00056463><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<pc>。
多亏了你，我才能到这里来！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56463.zh-Hant:
<voice 00400_00056463><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>謝謝你，<pc>。
多虧你我才能來到這裡！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56464.en: <voice 00440_00056464><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Huh? That guy.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56464.ja: <voice 00440_00056464><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「あれ？　あの人って……。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56464.ko: <voice 00440_00056464><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 어? 저 사람은…….<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56464.zh-Hans: <voice 00440_00056464><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>诶？那个人是……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56464.zh-Hant: <voice 00440_00056464><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>咦？那個人是……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56465.en:
<voice 00730_00056465><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Um. You are the next grand priest, Mr.
Zodera, right?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56465.ja:
<voice 00730_00056465><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「あの……。あなたは　次の大神官になる
　ゾデラさん……ですよね？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56465.ko:
<voice 00730_00056465><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 저……. 그쪽은 차기 대신관님인
　조데라 씨…… 맞죠?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56465.zh-Hans:
<voice 00730_00056465><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>那个……你是要成为下一任大神官的
佐提拉……吧？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56465.zh-Hant:
<voice 00730_00056465><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>你好……你是即將成為下一任大神官的
佐提拉先生……對吧？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56467.en:
<voice 00882_00056467><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Excuse me...! It's Mr. Zodera, isn't
it!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56467.ja: <voice 00882_00056467><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「あのっ！　ゾデラさんっですよねっ！？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56467.ko: <voice 00882_00056467><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 저기! 조데라 씨 맞죠!?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56467.zh-Hans: <voice 00882_00056467><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>那个！你就是佐提拉吧？！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56467.zh-Hant: <voice 00882_00056467><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>我說！你是佐提拉先生對吧！？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56468.en: <voice 00962_00056468><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>Yes, it is.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56469.en:
Nice to meet you! I am dancer Liddy of the Gizant troupe. I will be dancing at the investiture ceremony of the
Grand Priest.
56469.ja:
<voice 01007_00056469><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「はじめまして！　ボクは
　ギザント一座の踊り子　リィディです。
　大神官の任命式で　踊ることになってます。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56469.ko:
<voice 01007_00056469><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 안녕하세요!
　전 기잔트 극단의 댄서 리이디예요.
　이번 대신관 임명식에서 공연을 하게 됐어요.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56469.zh-Hans:
<voice 01007_00056469><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>初次见面！我是基赞特剧团的舞者，莉蒂。
会在这次大神官的任命仪式上表演舞蹈。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56469.zh-Hant:
<voice 01007_00056469><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>初次見面！
我是基贊特劇團的舞者，莉蒂。
我會在大神官的任命儀式上跳舞。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56470.en: <voice 01182_00056470><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>How did you become a dancer?<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56470.ja: <voice 01182_00056470><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>「……お前は　なぜ　踊り子などになった？<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56470.ko: <voice 01182_00056470><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>: ……넌 왜 댄서 같은 것이 됐지?<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56470.zh-Hans: <voice 01182_00056470><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>……你为什么要成为舞者？<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56470.zh-Hant: <voice 01182_00056470><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>……妳為何成為舞者呢？<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56471.en:
<voice 01222_00056471><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Let's see. When I was a little kid, I
saw a performance by the Sitar troupe.
It was really interesting!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56471.ja:
<voice 01222_00056471><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「えっと。ボク　ちっちゃい頃に
　シタル一座って芸人一座の　公演を見たんです。
　それが　すっごく　おもしろくって！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56471.ko:
<voice 01222_00056471><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 그게, 어릴 때 시타르 극단이라는
　예능인 극단의 공연을 봤는데
　그게 엄청나게 재미있었거든요!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56471.zh-Hans:
<voice 01222_00056471><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>这个啊。我小时候看过
一个叫锡塔尔剧团的艺人团的表演。
那场表演特别有趣！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56471.zh-Hant:
<voice 01222_00056471><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>這個嘛，我小時候看過一個
叫錫塔爾劇團的藝人劇團表演。
那真的是很有趣！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56472.en:
Among them, Janna, a dancer, danced so beautifully that I was attracted to her. So I decided to join the Sitar
troupe.
56472.ja:
<voice 01402_00056472><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「中でも　ジャンナさんっていう踊り子の踊りが
　とっても　きれいで　あこがれちゃったんです。
　それで　シタル一座に入ろうって思って。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56472.ko:
<voice 01402_00056472><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 그중에서도 잔나 씨라는 댄서의 춤이
　너무 아름다워서 동경심이 생겼어요.
　그래서 시타르 극단에 들어가기로 마음먹었죠.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56472.zh-Hans:
<voice 01402_00056472><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>其中有一个叫江娜的舞者。
她的舞蹈非常美，我也想变成她那样。
所以才想加入锡塔尔剧团。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56472.zh-Hant:
<voice 01402_00056472><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>其中有一位叫做珍娜的舞者，
她美麗的舞蹈令我十分憧憬。
於是我就想加入錫塔爾劇團。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56473.en:
<voice 01457_00056473><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>When I joined the troupe, Janna had
already quit, and the chairman had
been replaced by the current Gizant.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56473.ja:
<voice 01457_00056473><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「ボクが　一座に入ったときには
　ジャンナさんは　もう　やめてて
　座長も　今のギザントさんに変わってたけど……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56473.ko:
<voice 01457_00056473><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 제가 극단에 들어왔을 때는
　잔나 씨는 이미 그만두고 없었고
　단장도 지금의 기잔트 씨로 바뀌었지만요……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56473.zh-Hans:
<voice 01457_00056473><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>但是我加入的时候，
江娜已经离开了，
团长也换成了现在的基赞特团长……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56473.zh-Hant:
<voice 01457_00056473><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>雖然我加入的時候，
珍娜已經不在了，
團長也已經換成現在的基贊特……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56474.en:
<voice 01497_00056474><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>But that's okay. I'm happy as long as
Zodera and all the customers enjoy the
show!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56474.ja:
<voice 01497_00056474><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「それでも　いいんです。
　ゾデラさんや　お客さんのみんなに
　楽しんでもらえれば　ボクは満足ですから！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56474.ko:
<voice 01497_00056474><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 하지만 그래도 괜찮아요.
　조데라 씨와 관객분들이 즐거워해 주신다면
　전 그걸로 만족하니까요!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56474.zh-Hans:
<voice 01497_00056474><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>不过没关系。
只要能让佐提拉和其他的观众都觉得开心，
我就满足了！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56474.zh-Hant:
<voice 01497_00056474><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>不過，那也無所謂。
只要讓佐提拉先生和觀眾們都感到快樂，
我就很滿足了！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56475.en:
<voice 01592_00056475><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>No matter what kind of dances or
tricks they show me, I cannot enjoy
them.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56475.ja:
<voice 01592_00056475><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>「どんな踊りや　芸を見せられようと
　私は　楽しむことなど　できない……。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56475.ko:
<voice 01592_00056475><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>: 그 어떤 춤이나 곡예를 보여 준들
　난 전혀 즐겁지 않을 거다…….<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56475.zh-Hans:
<voice 01592_00056475><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>不管是什么样的舞蹈和表演
都不能让我开心起来……<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56475.zh-Hant:
<voice 01592_00056475><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>不論看了什麼舞蹈或表演，
我都無法感受到快樂……<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56477.en:
<voice 01672_00056477><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>Especially for a dancer like you. I'm
going back to Alltrades Abbey.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56477.ja:
<voice 01672_00056477><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>「お前のような　踊り子なら　なおさらだ。
　……私は　ダーマ神殿へ戻る。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56477.ko:
<voice 01672_00056477><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>: 너 같은 댄서라면 더더욱.
　……난 다마 신전으로 돌아가마.<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56477.zh-Hans:
<voice 01672_00056477><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>尤其是你这样的舞者。
……我回达玛神殿了。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56477.zh-Hant:
<voice 01672_00056477><start_lip_sync n02131 _normal m00001>尤其是看像妳這樣的舞者表演。
……我先回達瑪神殿了。<stop_lip_animation n02131 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56478.en:
<voice 01952_00056478><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>What was that? Did you just say that I
can't entertain everyone when I'm new?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56478.ja:
<voice 01952_00056478><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「……今のなに？　もしかして
　新人のボクじゃ　みんなを楽しませるなんて
　ムリだって言ったの？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56478.ko:
<voice 01952_00056478><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: ……방금 그게 무슨 소리야?
　설마 나 같은 신참 댄서는 사람들을
　즐겁게 해 줄 수 없단 거야?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56478.zh-Hans:
<voice 01952_00056478><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>……他刚才的话什么意思？
他是说我一个新人，
没有办法让大家开心起来吗？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56478.zh-Hant:
<voice 01952_00056478><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>……他是什麼意思？
難道是嫌我這個新人怎麼可能
讓大家看得開心嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56479.en:
<voice 02014_00056479><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>I heard he was an unsociable person,
but you didn't have to say anything
like that!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56479.ja:
<voice 02014_00056479><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「無愛想な人だって　聞いてたけど
　あんなこと　言わなくてもいいじゃん！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56479.ko:
<voice 02014_00056479><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 무뚝뚝한 사람이란 말은 들었지만
　저렇게 말할 필요는 없잖아!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56479.zh-Hans:
<voice 02014_00056479><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>我是听说过他比较冷淡，
但是也不用说得这么过分吧！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56479.zh-Hant:
<voice 02014_00056479><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>我聽說過他很冷漠，
但說的話也太狠了吧！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56480.en:
<voice 02110_00056480><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>It's okay. Go ahead and watch! I'll
make her say she had a great time!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56480.ja:
<voice 02110_00056480><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「いいよ。見てなって！
　ぜーったいに　あの人に　楽しかったって
　言わせてやるから！！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56480.ko:
<voice 02110_00056480><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 두고 보라지!
　저 사람 입에서 반드시 즐거웠단
　말이 나오게 만들어 줄 테니까!!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56480.zh-Hans:
<voice 02110_00056480><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>好吧。看着吧！
我一定要让那个人说出
看了我的舞蹈觉得很开心的感言！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56480.zh-Hant:
<voice 02110_00056480><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>好啊，我就讓你見識見識！
我絕──對要讓那傢伙說出
「今天真開心」給你看！！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56481.en:
<voice 02175_00056481><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Oh, hey, heads up. I almost forgot
what I came here for. I'll have to
make a wish on Wish Flower.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56481.ja:
<voice 02175_00056481><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「あっ……と　あぶない。
　ここに来た目的を　忘れちゃうとこだったよ。
　希望の花に　願いごとをしなきゃね。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56481.ko:
<voice 02175_00056481><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 아…… 참, 정신 차려야지.
　여기 온 목적을 깜빡할 뻔했어.
　희망의 꽃에 소원을 빌어야 해.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56481.zh-Hans:
<voice 02175_00056481><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>啊……好险。
我差点忘了来这里的目的了。
我要向希望之花许愿。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56481.zh-Hant:
<voice 02175_00056481><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>啊……好險，
差點忘了來這裡的目的。
我得向希望之花許願才行。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56482.ja: <voice 02515_00056482><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「よし……っと。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56482.ko: <voice 02515_00056482><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 좋아…… 됐다.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56483.en:
If I bring this vase back home and it doesn't wither and flowers open properly, my dream will come true, he
said.
56483.ja:
<voice 02750_00056483><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「このつぼみを持ち帰って
　枯れずに　ちゃんと花が開いたら
　夢が　かなうんだって。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56483.ko:
<voice 02750_00056483><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 이 봉오리가 시들지 않고
　꽃을 피우면 꿈이 이뤄진대.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56483.zh-Hans:
<voice 02750_00056483><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>据说把花苞带回去，
如果它没有枯萎，顺利开了花的话，
梦想就能实现了。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56483.zh-Hant:
<voice 02750_00056483><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>把這個花苞帶回家，
只要不讓它枯萎，開花了的話，
聽說就能實現夢想。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56484.en:
<voice 02787_00056484><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Are you curious about my wish? But
it's a secret. Hmmm.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56484.ja:
<voice 02787_00056484><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「ボクの願いごとが　気になっちゃう？
　でも　秘密だよ。ふふっ。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56484.ko:
<voice 02787_00056484><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 내 소원이 궁금해?
　하지만 비밀이야, 후후.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56484.zh-Hans:
<voice 02787_00056484><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>你想知道我许的是什么愿望吗？
这是秘密。呵呵。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56484.zh-Hant:
<voice 02787_00056484><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>你好奇我許了什麼願嗎？
這是祕密。呵呵。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56485.en:
Well, now that we've done what we had to do, let's go back to Allmighty Alltrades. I'll thank you for your
help, but you'll have to come see me later.
56485.ja:
<voice 02849_00056485><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「さ～て　やることは　やったし
　ダーマの神殿に　戻ろっか。
　お礼をするから　後でボクのとこに来てね。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56485.ko:
<voice 02849_00056485><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 좋아~ 그럼 할 일은 다 했으니
　다마 신전으로 돌아갈까.
　사례할 테니까 나중에 날 찾아와.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56485.zh-Hans:
<voice 02849_00056485><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>好～了，要做的事都做完了，
回达玛神殿去吧。
我会给你谢礼的，之后来找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56485.zh-Hant:
<voice 02849_00056485><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>好～了，該做的事都做完了，
回達瑪神殿吧。
我會好好答謝你的，等會來找我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56486.en:
<voice 00120_00056486><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Ah <pc>. I've been waiting
for you to come back.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56486.ja:
<voice 00120_00056486><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「あっ　<pc>さん。
　戻ってくるのを　待ってたよ。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56486.ko:
<voice 00120_00056486><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 아, <pc> 씨.
　돌아오길 기다렸어.<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56486.zh-Hans:
<voice 00120_00056486><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>。
我一直等你回来呢。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56486.zh-Hant:
<voice 00120_00056486><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>啊，<pc>，
我等你好久了。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56487.en:
<voice 00230_00056487><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Thanks for taking me up the hill.
Here, take it. It's my way of saying
thank you!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56487.ja:
<voice 00230_00056487><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「丘まで　連れてってくれて　ありがとう。
　これ　お礼だから　受け取って！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56487.ko:
<voice 00230_00056487><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 언덕에 데려가 줘서 고마워.
　이건 답례야, 받아!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56487.zh-Hans:
<voice 00230_00056487><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>谢谢你带我去希望之丘。
这是谢礼，请收下吧！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56487.zh-Hant:
<voice 00230_00056487><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>謝謝你帶我到山丘上。
這是謝禮，請收下！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

56488.en:
Come to think of it, why was Mr. Zodera at Wish Flower Hill? You don't look like the kind of person who makes
wishes.
56488.ja:
<voice 00330_00056488><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「そういえば　ゾデラさんは
　なんで　希望の花の丘に　いたのかな？
　願いごとをするような人に　見えないけど……。<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56488.ko:
<voice 00330_00056488><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 그런데 조데라 씨는
　왜 희망의 꽃이 피는 언덕에 있었던 걸까?
　꽃에 소원을 빌 사람 같아 보이진 않던데…….<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56488.zh-Hans:
<voice 00330_00056488><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>回想起来，佐提拉为什么
会在长着希望之花的山丘呢？
他看起来也不像是会向花许愿的人……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56488.zh-Hant:
<voice 00330_00056488><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>說起來，佐提拉先生
為什麼會去希望之花生長的山丘呢？
他看起來不像是會許願的人……<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56489.en:
<voice 00370_00056489><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>Hey Liddy, what are you doing over
there?<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56489.ja:
<voice 00370_00056489><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「おい　リィディ。
　そんなとこで　何やってんだ？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56489.ko:
<voice 00370_00056489><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 이봐, 리이디.
　그런 데서 뭐 하는 거야?<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56489.zh-Hans:
<voice 00370_00056489><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>哎，莉蒂。
你在那里干什么呢？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56489.zh-Hant:
<voice 00370_00056489><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>喂，莉蒂，
妳在那裡做什麼？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56490.en:
<voice 00460_00056490><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>Oh, Gizant, the chairperson. I met Mr.
Zodera at the hill where the Wish
Flower blooms, but he's terrible!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56490.ja:
<voice 00460_00056490><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「あっ　ギザント座長。
　希望の花が咲く丘で　ゾデラさんに会ったけど
　あの人　ひどいんだよ！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56490.ko:
<voice 00460_00056490><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 아, 기잔트 단장님.
　희망의 꽃이 피는 언덕에서 조데라 씨를
　만났는데 그 사람 진짜 성격 이상한 거 있지!?<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56490.zh-Hans:
<voice 00460_00056490><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>啊，基赞特团长。
我在开着希望之花的山丘见到了佐提拉，
他说话太过分了！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56490.zh-Hant:
<voice 00460_00056490><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>啊，基贊特團長。
我在希望之花生長的山丘見到佐提拉先生了，
但是那個人真不會說話！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56491.en:
<voice 00500_00056491><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>He told me it was impossible for a
dancer like you to entertain everyone!
I'm so angry just thinking about it!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56491.ja:
<voice 00500_00056491><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「お前みたいな踊り子じゃ　みんなを
　楽しませるなんて　ムリだって言われちゃった！
　あーもう　思いだしても　ハラが立つなあ！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56491.ko:
<voice 00500_00056491><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 너 같은 댄서는 사람들을
　즐겁게 해줄 수 없다지 뭐야!
　진짜, 다시 생각해도 열 받아!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56491.zh-Hans:
<voice 00500_00056491><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>他说像我这样的舞者，
是没有办法让大家都觉得开心的！
啊，真讨厌！一想起来就生气！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56491.zh-Hant:
<voice 00500_00056491><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>他說像我這樣的舞者，
怎麼可能帶給大家歡樂！
氣死我了，光想就火大！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56492.en:
<voice 00540_00056492><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>Yeah, okay, okay. You want to give
Zodera a big fat ''ah-ha''? Then you
need to rehearse properly!<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56492.ja:
<voice 00540_00056492><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「ああ　わかった　わかった。
　ゾデラを　ギャフンと　言わせたいってんだろ？
　なら　しっかりと　けいこをしなくちゃな！<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56492.ko:
<voice 00540_00056492><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 그래, 알았다 알았어.
　조데라한테 한 방 먹여 주고 싶은 거지?
　그럼 열심히 연습해야지!<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56492.zh-Hans:
<voice 00540_00056492><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>好好，我知道了，知道了。
你想让佐提拉无话可说是吧！
那你就要好好练习！<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56492.zh-Hant:
<voice 00540_00056492><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>好了好了，我知道了。
妳想讓佐提拉對妳刮目相看對吧？
那妳得加緊練習了！<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56493.en:
<voice 00580_00056493><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>You're the chairperson. You know what
you're doing. Well then, <pc>
I'm going back to Keiko!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56493.ja:
<voice 00580_00056493><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>「さっすが　座長。わかってる～。
　それじゃあ　<pc>さん
　ボクは　けいこに戻るね！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56493.ko:
<voice 00580_00056493><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>: 역시 단장님이야. 말이 잘 통한다니까~
　그럼 <pc> 씨
　난 연습하러 돌아갈게!<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56493.zh-Hans:
<voice 00580_00056493><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>不愧是团长。太了解我了～
那么，<pc>
我回去练习了！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56493.zh-Hant:
<voice 00580_00056493><start_lip_sync n02134 _normal m00001>真不愧是團長，你真瞭解～
那麼，<pc>，
我回去練習了！<stop_lip_animation n02134 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56494.en:
<voice 00800_00056494><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>Zodera on Wish Flower Hill? I guess
you still can't forget.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56494.ja:
<voice 00800_00056494><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「ゾデラが　希望の花の丘に……か。
　やはり　まだ　忘れられないんだな。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56494.ko:
<voice 00800_00056494><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 조데라가 희망의 꽃이 피는 언덕에…….
　역시 아직 못 잊은 모양이군.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56494.zh-Hans:
<voice 00800_00056494><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>佐提拉去了长着希望之花的山丘……吗。
他果然还是无法忘记啊。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56494.zh-Hant:
<voice 00800_00056494><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>佐提拉去了希望之花生長的山丘嗎……
他果然還是忘不了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56495.en:
<voice 00855_00056495><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>I saw you at the Town of Celed. You
saw me talking to Zodera back there,
didn't you?<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56495.ja:
<voice 00855_00056495><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「あんた……。セレドの町で　見かけたな。
　あのとき　オレとゾデラが
　話しているのを　見てただろう？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56495.ko:
<voice 00855_00056495><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 당신……. 셀레도 마을에서 만났었지.
　그때 나랑 조데라가 얘기하는 걸 봤지?<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56495.zh-Hans:
<voice 00855_00056495><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>你……我在塞莱德镇见过你吧。
那时你看见我和佐提拉说话了吧？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56495.zh-Hant:
<voice 00855_00056495><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>你啊……我在塞萊德鎮見過你。
那時候你看到
我和佐提拉在交談的樣子吧？<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56496.en:
I'm going to tell you something, because there's no point in hiding it. His real name is Sitar, and he was the
leader of this troupe before me.
56496.ja:
<voice 00917_00056496><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「隠しても　仕方ねえから言っちまうが
　神官のゾデラはな。本当は　シタルって名前で
　オレの前に　この一座の座長をやってたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56496.ko:
<voice 00917_00056496><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 숨겨도 소용없으니 털어놓자면
　신관 조데라의 본명은 시타르로
　이 극단의 전임 단장이었어.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56496.zh-Hans:
<voice 00917_00056496><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>瞒着你也没用，索性告诉你吧。
佐提拉神官啊，本名叫锡塔尔，
是这个剧团上一任的团长。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56496.zh-Hant:
<voice 00917_00056496><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>瞞著你也沒用，我就說了。
佐提拉神官他啊，本名是錫塔爾，
也就是劇團的前任團長。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56497.en:
<voice 00947_00056497><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>I was on my way here after a show at
Gran Zedora. Janna, the dancer who was
the star of the troupe, died.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56497.ja:
<voice 00947_00056497><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「……グランゼドーラでの興行を終えて
　ここに向かっていた途中のことだった。
　一座の花形だった踊り子　ジャンナが死んだ。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56497.ko:
<voice 00947_00056497><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: ……그랑제도라에서 공연을 마치고
　이곳으로 오던 길에 일어난 일이었다.
　극단의 간판스타였던 댄서 잔나가 죽고 말았지.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56497.zh-Hans:
<voice 00947_00056497><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>……那是在古兰泽朵拉的表演结束，
前往这里的途中发生的事。
剧团的明星舞者江娜死了。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56497.zh-Hant:
<voice 00947_00056497><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>……那是在古蘭澤朵拉的演出結束，
要前往這裡的中途發生的事。
劇團的當家舞者，珍娜過世了。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56498.en:
Janna went for the Wish Flower and was attacked by a monster, but Chairman Sitar felt it was his fault and quit
the troupe.
56498.ja:
<voice 00987_00056498><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「ジャンナは　希望の花を取りにいって
　魔物に襲われたんだが　シタル座長は
　自分の責任と感じて　一座をやめちまったんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56498.ko:
<voice 00987_00056498><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 잔나는 희망의 꽃을 꺾으러 갔다가
　마물에게 공격당했는데, 시타르 단장은
　자기 책임이란 생각에 극단을 그만뒀어.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56498.zh-Hans:
<voice 00987_00056498><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>江娜是在摘希望之花时，
遭到怪物袭击而死的，但是锡塔尔团长
觉得责任在自己，便辞去了团长一职。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56498.zh-Hant:
<voice 00987_00056498><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>珍娜在摘取希望之花時被怪物襲擊，
錫塔爾團長認為是自己的責任，
便辭去團長的職位。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56499.en:
Then I heard that the chairperson had become a priest. I was so surprised when I heard that he was a candidate
for the next great priest.
56499.ja:
<voice 01049_00056499><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「そしたら　その座長が　神官になっててさ。
　次の大神官候補なんだって　聞いたときは
　ひっくり返るほど　おどろいたよ。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56499.ko:
<voice 01049_00056499><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 그러더니 그 단장이 신관이 됐지 뭐냐.
　차기 대신관 후보란 얘길 들었을 땐
　놀라 자빠질 뻔했다니까.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56499.zh-Hans:
<voice 01049_00056499><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>然后前任团长就成了神官。
我听说他是下一任大神官候补时，
真是大吃一惊。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56499.zh-Hant:
<voice 01049_00056499><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>然後，錫塔爾團長成為了神官。
我聽說他成為下一任大神官候選人時，
簡直嚇了一大跳。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56500.en:
To be honest, I'm not the chairman of the Utsuwa, so I've asked him several times to come back to the tavern and
join the troupe, but he's always refused.
56500.ja:
<voice 01079_00056500><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「正直　オレは　座長のウツワじゃねえから
　酒場に呼びだして　一座に戻ってくれないかと
　何度か　頼んでみたが　断られっぱなしさ。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56500.ko:
<voice 01079_00056500><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 솔직히 난 단장을 맡을 그릇이 못 돼서
　주점으로 불러내 극단으로 돌아오지 않겠냐고
　여러 번 부탁했는데 번번이 거절하더군.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56500.zh-Hans:
<voice 01079_00056500><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>说实话，我不是当团长的料，
所以我把他叫去酒馆，
多次拜托他回到剧团，但都被他拒绝了。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56500.zh-Hant:
<voice 01079_00056500><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>說實話，我並不適合當劇團的團長，
所以我找他去酒館勸他回來過很多次，
卻總是被拒絕。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56501.en:
Liddy might be too nervous to dance if he knew that Zodera was the leader of the Sitar troupe he longed to be a
part of.
56501.ja:
<voice 01119_00056501><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「自分が　あこがれた　シタル一座の座長が
　あのゾデラだと知ったら　リィディは緊張して
　踊れなくなっちまうかもしれねえな……。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56501.ko:
<voice 01119_00056501><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 그토록 존경하는 시타르 극단의 단장이
　조데라란 걸 알면 리이디는
　긴장해서 제대로 춤도 못 출 거야…….<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56501.zh-Hans:
<voice 01119_00056501><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>如果莉蒂知道了自己一直崇拜的
锡塔尔剧团的团长就是那个佐提拉的话，
她没准会紧张得跳不了舞……<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56501.zh-Hant:
<voice 01119_00056501><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>要是知道自己崇拜的
錫塔爾劇團的團長就是佐提拉，
莉蒂應該會緊張到連舞都跳不好吧……<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56502.en:
<voice 01149_00056502><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>He's got talent. I think he can
surpass even Janna. That's why I want
to make this show a success.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56502.ja:
<voice 01149_00056502><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「あいつには　才能があるんだ。
　ジャンナさえ超えられると　オレは思ってる。
　だから　今度の公演は成功させたい。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56502.ko:
<voice 01149_00056502><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 그 녀석은 재능이 있어.
　난 잔나도 뛰어넘을 수 있다고 생각해.
　그래서 이번 공연을 꼭 성공시키고 싶다.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56502.zh-Hans:
<voice 01149_00056502><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>那家伙是有才能的。
我认为她甚至可以超越江娜。
所以我希望这次的公演能成功。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56502.zh-Hant:
<voice 01149_00056502><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>她很有天賦，
我認為她甚至可以超越珍娜。
所以我希望這次的公演能夠成功。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>

56503.en:
Listen, don't reveal Zodera's true identity. Not just to Liddy, but to everyone at the temple. I don't want
to cause a scene here and now.
56503.ja:
<voice 01189_00056503><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>「いいか。ゾデラの正体を　バラすなよ。
　リィディだけじゃなく　神殿の誰にもだ。
　今ここで　騒ぎは起こしたくねえからな。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56503.ko:
<voice 01189_00056503><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>: 잘 들어, 조데라의 정체를 떠벌리지 마라.
　리이디만이 아니라 신전의 그 누구에게도.
　이 타이밍에 소란을 일으키고 싶지 않으니까.<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56503.zh-Hans:
<voice 01189_00056503><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>听好了，不能暴露佐提拉的真实身份。
不光是莉蒂，对神殿里的其他人也要保密。
我不希望这里发生任何混乱。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
56503.zh-Hant:
<voice 01189_00056503><start_lip_sync n02133 _normal m00001>聽好了，別揭穿佐提拉的真實身分。
不只是莉蒂，也不能告訴神殿的人。
我不想在這裡惹麻煩。<stop_lip_animation n02133 CLOSE_MOUTH>
